game.shortDescription: 게이밍 역사에 한 획을 그은 Gears가 그 어느 때보다 커진 타이틀로 돌아옵니다. 총력전을 퍼부으며 케이트 디아즈는 적과의 관계를 알아내기 위해 빠져나가 세라에게 닥친 진짜 위험을 발견합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From one of gaming’s most acclaimed sagas, Gears is bigger than ever. With all-out war descending, Kait Diaz breaks away to uncover her connection to the enemy and discovers the true danger to Sera – herself.

So buggy and poorly implemented. Had to refund it because no matter what I tried it wouldn't connect to online services, which blocked me from playing...
